title: Stephen Sondheim - Follies (New Broadway Cast) [flac]
description:
The wonderfully unsinkable Elaine Paige returns with the cast recording from her revival of James Goldman and Stephen SondheimÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 1971 musical Follies, featuring Paige in the central role as the actress Carlotta Campion, and also featuring Bernadette Peters, Jan Maxwell, Danny Burstein, and Ron Raines.
